data.actual_result: The selection box stays in the last selected emoji, and if you click the box will update but nothing will happen
data.expected_result: After hovering the mouse over an emoji, the selection box should update as you scroll down the emoji list
data.short_description: When hovering over the emoji picker UI, selection box won't update unless you move the mouse/click
data.steps_to_repro: - Hover the mouse over any emoji - Scroll down - (Optional) scroll down and click (nothing will happen)
